lyrics:
2 contributorseverytime we touch verano remix lyricsintro
i get this feeling
i swear i could fly
i feel the static
i reach for the sky
i get this feeling
i swear i could fly
i feel the static
i reach for the sky
i get this feeling

verse 1
i still hear your voice when you sleep next to me
i still feel your touch in my dream
forgive me my weakness but i dont know why
without you its hard to survive

chorus
cause everytime we touch i get this feeling
and everytime we kiss i swear i could fly
cant you feel my heart beat fast i want this to last
need you by my side

and everytime we kiss i reach for the sky
cant you hear my heart beat so i cant let you go
want you in my life
see cascada liveget tickets as low as 83you might also likedrop

your arms are my castle your heart is my sky
they wipe away tears that i cry that i cry
the good and the bad times weve been through them all
you make me rise when i fall

chorus
